description: Airing on Friday Dec. 5, 2014: Tesla is building a battery factory outside of Reno that has electric companies scared. The idea is to build batteries that can store the solar power collected by rooftop solar panels. Plus, Starbucks has plans to open dozens of stores selling pricey craft coffees. The gourmet coffee trend is spreading to hip neighborhoods across the country.
byline: Adam Allington, Tracey Samuelson, Kai Ryssdal and Karen Clark
title: Marketplace for Friday December 5, 2014
